bug.author: yustaub
bug.summary: error happend when I try multiscale test
bug.description:
I change the img_scale to img_scale=[(1400, 1000), (1400, 800), (1400,600)] in test_pipeline, my command is CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7 ./tools/dist_test.sh configs/faster_rcnn/faster_rcnn_r50_fpn_1x_coco.py ./checkpoints/faster_rcnn_r50_fpn_1x_coco_20200130-047c8118.pth 8 --eval bbox <denchmark-h:h1>error log</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>[ ] 0/5000, elapsed: 0s, ETA:Traceback (most recent call last): File "./tools/test.py", line 149, in <module> main() File "./tools/test.py", line 134, in main args.gpu_collect) File "/home/joseph/ml_test/mmdetection/mmdet/apis/test.py", line 114, in multi_gpu_test result = model(return_loss=False, rescale=True, **data) File "/home/joseph/anaconda3/envs/open-mmlab/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 532, in __call__ result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs) File "/home/joseph/anaconda3/envs/open-mmlab/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/distributed.py", line 447, in forward output = self.module(*inputs[0], **kwargs[0]) File 151, in forward return self.forward_test(img, img_metas, **kwargs) File "/home/joseph/ml_test/mmdetection/mmdet/models/detectors/base.py", line 136, in forward_test return self.aug_test(imgs, img_metas, **kwargs) File "/home/joseph/ml_test/mmdetection/mmdet/models/detectors/two_stage.py", line 204, in aug_test x, proposal_list, img_metas, rescale=rescale) File
